content: GF#22622 asks how we're going to mark the "title" of a Map. I.e. is it using double-quotes, back-ticks (as per FHIRPath) or something else. Opinions?
From a user perspective I would argue that the title is not really an identifier. Therefore I would prefer the option to make it a string with single quotes
I think the new plan is to align with whatever FSH is doing
